title: Malaysia : number of Facebook users 2017 to 2023
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of users in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 7.
Overall Number of users in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2023.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest Number of users in millions, of value 24.2 was reached at Year 2023
The lowest Number of users in millions, of value 22.0 was reported at Year 2017
